name: bbn\Db\Internal\Native

fetch.name: fetch
fetch.summary: Return an indexed array with the first result of the query or false if there are no results.
fetch.comments:
/**
   * Return an indexed array with the first result of the query or false if there are no results.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->fetch("SELECT name FROM users WHERE id = 10"));
   * /* (array)
   * [
   *  "name" => "john",
   *  0 => "john",
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $query
   * @return array|false
   */

fetchAll.name: fetchAll
fetchAll.summary: Return an array of indexed array with all results of the query or false if there are no results.

doc.description:
Return an array of indexed array with all results of the query or false if there are no results.

```php
X::dump($db->fetchAll("SELECT 'surname', 'name', 'id' FROM users WHERE name = 'john'"));
/* (array)
 [
   [
   "surname" => "White",
   0 => "White",
   "name" => "Michael",
   1 => "Michael",
   "id"  => 1,
   2 => 1,
   ],
   [
   "surname" => "Smith",
   0 => "Smith",
   "name" => "John",
   1  =>  "John",
   "id" => 2,
   2 => 2,
   ],
 ]
```

fetchAll.comments:
/**
   * Return an array of indexed array with all results of the query or false if there are no results.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->fetchAll("SELECT 'surname', 'name', 'id' FROM users WHERE name = 'john'"));
   * /* (array)
   *  [
   *    [
   *    "surname" => "White",
   *    0 => "White",
   *    "name" => "Michael",
   *    1 => "Michael",
   *    "id"  => 1,
   *    2 => 1,
   *    ],
   *    [
   *    "surname" => "Smith",
   *    0 => "Smith",
   *    "name" => "John",
   *    1  =>  "John",
   *    "id" => 2,
   *    2 => 2,
   *    ],
   *  ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $query
   * @return array|false
   */

fetchColumn.name: fetchColumn
fetchColumn.summary: Transposition of the original fetchColumn method, but with the query included. Return an array or false if no result

doc.description: Transposition of the original fetchColumn method, but with the query included. Return an array or false if no result

todo.text: confusion between result's index and this->query arguments(IMPORTANT). Missing the example because the function doesn't work

   * Transposition of the original fetchColumn method, but with the query included. Return an array or false if no result

fetchObject.name: fetchObject
fetchObject.summary: Return stdClass object or false if no result.
fetchObject.comments:
/**
   * Return stdClass object or false if no result.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->fetchObject("SELECT * FROM table_users WHERE name = 'john'"));
   * // stdClass Object {
   *                    "id"  =>  1,
   *                    "name"  =>  "John",
   *                    "surname"  =>  "Smith",
   *                    }
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $query
   * @return bool|\stdClass
   */

query.name: query
query.summary: Executes a writing statement and return the number of affected rows or return a query object for the reading * statement

doc.description: Executes a writing statement and return the number of affected rows or return a query object for the reading * statement

query.comments:
/**
   * Executes a writing statement and return the number of affected rows or return a query object for the reading * statement
   * @todo far vedere a thomams perche non funziona in lettura
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->query("DELETE FROM table_users WHERE name LIKE '%lucy%'"));
   * // (int) 3
   * X::dump($db->query("SELECT * FROM table_users WHERE name = 'John"));
   * // (bbn\Db\Query) Object
   * ```
   *
   * @param array|string $statement
   * @return false|int|Query
   */

executeStatement.name: executeStatement

dummyComments:
/**
   * Return an indexed array with the first result of the query or false if there are no results.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->fetch("SELECT name FROM users WHERE id = 10"));
   * /* (array)
   * [
   *  "name" => "john",
   *  0 => "john",
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $query
   * @return array|false
   */

/**
   * Return an array of indexed array with all results of the query or false if there are no results.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->fetchAll("SELECT 'surname', 'name', 'id' FROM users WHERE name = 'john'"));
   * /* (array)
   *  [
   *    [
   *    "surname" => "White",
   *    0 => "White",
   *    "name" => "Michael",
   *    1 => "Michael",
   *    "id"  => 1,
   *    2 => 1,
   *    ],
   *    [
   *    "surname" => "Smith",
   *    0 => "Smith",
   *    "name" => "John",
   *    1  =>  "John",
   *    "id" => 2,
   *    2 => 2,
   *    ],
   *  ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $query
   * @return array|false
   */

/**
   * Return stdClass object or false if no result.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->fetchObject("SELECT * FROM table_users WHERE name = 'john'"));
   * // stdClass Object {
   *                    "id"  =>  1,
   *                    "name"  =>  "John",
   *                    "surname"  =>  "Smith",
   *                    }
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $query
   * @return bool|\stdClass
   */

   * // (bbn\Db\Query) Object
